english.segment1: Come, let us worship and bow down. Before the Lord Most Holy. Before the King of Glory
english.segment2: Come and lay your burdens down. Before the Friend who's faithful. Before the One who's able
english.segment3: For He is our God. And we are His people. [Yes] He is our God. And we will never be forsaken
english.segment4: Come, let us lift our voice in praise. Unto the Rock of Ages. Unto the God who saves us
english.segment5: Come and glorify His name. All the earth together. All the saints forever
english.segment6: You are our God. And we are Your people. You are our God. And we will be with You Forever
